notes: The caster flops forward at a speed of 800, and accelerates until it reaches a speed of 1250.
Due to the included vertical movements, the duration of the flap may vary based on the terrain. On flat ground, one flop takes ?0.4 seconds.
On flat ground the entire spell therefore lasts ?1.3 seconds, considering the initial delay before the flopping begins.
Destroys trees around the caster upon impact with the ground, within the impact area.
The damage and slow are applied around the caster upon landing after the flops.
Due to the flop distance and radius, enemies which are 375-425 range in front of the caster upon cast can get hit by both flops.
abilities.description: Flop forward like an ogre seal 2 times, dealing 150 damage in a 225 radius by 100% for 1 second on each bounce. 400 bounce distance.

name: Ogre Seal Totem
description: A totem carved from an ogre seal's tooth.
trivia: For the neutral item seen in Siltbreaker and Aghanim's Labyrinth, see Ogre Seal Totem.
